jProtocol.tls12.model.ciphersuites

Class TlsCipherSuiteRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • jProtocol.tls12.model.ciphersuites.TlsCipherSuiteRegistry

  • public class TlsCipherSuiteRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TlsCipherSuiteRegistry()
      Creates a cipher suite registry offering access to implemented cipher suites.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TlsCipherSuite> allCipherSuites()
      Returns all implemented cipher suites which can be used for a secure connection.
      TlsCipherSuite cipherSuiteFromCode(short code)
      Returns a TLSCipherSuite object registered for the code (see p.75 TLS 1.2 specification RFC 5246).
      TlsCipherSuite getNullCipherSuite()
      Returns the cipher suite TLS_NULL_WITH_NULL_NULL (no encryption or mac).
      short getPreferredCipherSuite()
      Returns the preferred cipher suite code.
      void setPreferredCipherSuite(short cipherSuiteCode)
      Sets the preferred cipher suite for the connection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TlsCipherSuiteRegistry

        public TlsCipherSuiteRegistry()
        Creates a cipher suite registry offering access to implemented cipher suites.

    • Method Detail

      • cipherSuiteFromCode

        public TlsCipherSuite cipherSuiteFromCode(short code)
                                   throws TlsInvalidCipherSuiteException
        Returns a TLSCipherSuite object registered for the code (see p.75 TLS 1.2 specification RFC 5246).
        Parameters:
        code - the cipher suite code
        Returns:
        the cipher suite
        Throws:
        TlsInvalidCipherSuiteException - if no cipher suite is registered for the code

      • allCipherSuites

        public java.util.List<TlsCipherSuite> allCipherSuites()
        Returns all implemented cipher suites which can be used for a secure connection. TLS_NULL_WITH_NULL_NULL is not included.
        Returns:
        a list of all implemented cipher suites

      • setPreferredCipherSuite

        public void setPreferredCipherSuite(short cipherSuiteCode)
        Sets the preferred cipher suite for the connection. Should be called before connecting for the client.
        Parameters:
        cipherSuiteCode - the preferred cipher suite code

      • getPreferredCipherSuite

        public short getPreferredCipherSuite()
        Returns the preferred cipher suite code.
        Returns:
        the preferred cipher suite code or -1 if no cipher suite is preferred

      • getNullCipherSuite

        public TlsCipherSuite getNullCipherSuite()
        Returns the cipher suite TLS_NULL_WITH_NULL_NULL (no encryption or mac).
        Returns:
        the TLS null cipher suite
